en-US.InventoryAnalyticsDescription: Monitor inventory levels, counts, and valuation metrics.
en-US.TurnoverDataUnavailable: No turnover data found for the selected range.
en-US.InventoryLevelsDescription: View product stock status and value.
en-US.FileManagerDescription: Upload, browse, and manage your store files.
en-US.DeleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
en-US.Name: Name
en-US.NoPaymentsInDateRange: No payments found in this date range
en-US.PaymentInfoLoadFailed: Payment information could not be loaded
en-US.ViewAndReportPayments: View and report all payment transactions
en-US.ManageAllOrders: Manage and track all your orders
en-US.FirstOrderWillAppear: Your first order will appear here.
en-US.AddFirstProduct: Add your first product to get started!
en-US.BulkUpdateInfo: You can update stock levels for multiple products at once.
en-US.ConfirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
en-US.AccessDeniedMessage: You do not have permission to access this page. Please contact your system administrator.
en-US.WhyThisError: Why am I getting this error?
en-US.NoPermission: You may not have the required permissions to access this page
en-US.AccountRestricted: Your account may be temporarily restricted
en-US.MaintenanceMode: The system may be in maintenance mode
en-US.CannotDelete: This category cannot be deleted (has products or subcategories)
en-US.ConfirmDeleteCategory: Are you sure you want to delete this category?
en-US.AddImageInfo: You can enter a URL if you want to add an image for the category
en-US.HierarchyTip: You can organize categories hierarchically to help customers find products more easily.
en-US.HierarchyExample: Example: You can create a "Soft Drinks" category under the "Beverages" category.
en-US.CreateHierarchy: You can create a hierarchical structure by selecting a parent category
en-US.DeactivateCategoryWarning: If you deactivate the category, products in this category may not be shown to customers.
en-US.IncomeCommissionNet: Revenue, commission and net earnings calculations
en-US.ErrorOccurred: An error occurred while processing your request.
en-US.DevHint1: Swapping to Development environment will display more detailed information about the error that occurred.
en-US.DevWarningTitle: The Development environment shouldn't be enabled for deployed applications.
en-US.DevWarningBody: It can result in displaying sensitive information from exceptions to end users. For local debugging, set ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT to Development and restart the app.
en-US.LocationInfo: Your location information is used to calculate the distance to customers.
en-US.FileUploadComingSoon: For now, you can only enter URLs. File upload feature will be added in a future update.
en-US.KeepProfileUpdated: Keep your profile information up to date
en-US.SetReasonableMinimum: Set a reasonable minimum order amount
en-US.NewOrderNotificationsDesc: Get notified when new orders arrive
en-US.NotificationsSavedLocally: Notification preferences are saved in your browser. Must be set separately on each device.
en-US.ThemeInfo: Preferred theme is saved and active across all pages
en-US.PasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
en-US.PasswordRequirements: Your password must be at least 8 characters and include uppercase, lowercase, and numbers.
en-US.WorkingHoursInfo: You can set your working hours to determine when customers can place orders.
en-US.Hours24Feature: Check if you provide continuous service
en-US.ClosedFeature: No orders accepted on that day
en-US.MondayAppliedToAll: Monday hours applied to all days
en-US.CourierReviewsWillAppear: Courier reviews will appear here after customers rate them.
en-US.ReviewsWillAppearHere: Reviews will appear here as customers provide feedback.
en-US.DownloadAllReviewsComingSoon: Download all reviews feature coming soon
en-US.ReviewsWillAppearAfterOrder: Reviews will appear here after customers place orders.
en-US.CancelOrderConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?
en-US.FirstOrderWillAppear: Your first order will appear here
en-US.PendingOrdersDesc: View and manage orders awaiting confirmation
en-US.NewOrdersWillAppear: New orders will appear here when they arrive
en-US.BulkConfirmComingSoon: All orders will be confirmed - This feature coming soon
en-US.ConfirmAllOrdersQuestion: Are you sure you want to confirm all pending orders?
en-US.DetailedRevenueAndMethodBreakdown: Detailed revenue analysis and payment method breakdown
en-US.SettlementInfo: Your payments are usually transferred to your bank account weekly. Check the Settlement Reports page for transfer transactions.
en-US.StatisticsDataNotLoaded: Statistics data could not be loaded
en-US.MerchantContextNotFound: Merchant context not found in session.
en-US.MerchantSettingsUpdateFailed: Failed to update merchant tracking settings.
en-US.MerchantSettingsDeleteFailed: Failed to delete merchant tracking settings.
en-US.UserSettingsUpdateFailed: Failed to update user tracking settings.
en-US.UserSettingsDeleteFailed: Failed to delete user tracking settings.
en-US.AuditLoggingCenterDescription: Review user activity, system changes, and security events in one place.
en-US.AuditCleanupSystemChangeFailed: Failed to clean system change logs.
en-US.AuditCleanupSecurityEventFailed: Failed to clean security event logs.
en-US.AuditNoUserActivity: No user activity entries to display.
en-US.PlatformAdminCenterDescription: Monitor key system metrics and administrative tasks from here.
en-US.UserSelfServiceDescription: Manage your profile, saved addresses, favorites, and order history.
en-US.FormValidationError: Please fix the validation errors in the form.
en-US.NotificationPreferencesUpdateFailed: Notification preferences could not be updated.
en-US.AddressSetDefaultFailed: Default address could not be updated.
en-US.FavoriteAddFailed: Product could not be added to favorites.
en-US.FavoriteRemoveFailed: Product could not be removed from favorites.
en-US.CancelOrderReasonRequired: Please provide a reason to cancel the order.
en-US.GeoAnalyticsDescription: Review delivery zones, location density, and real-time geographic metrics.
